Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying to add lockers that the player can hide in, but making it a room has broken my game. But when I just make it a verb, the player can still leave the room while being inside the locker. Any ideas on how to fix this? 

PS: Am I just being dumb?

Posts.EditableText: Why does making it a room cause a problem? That seems the most logical way to do it.

I was going to say that making it a room causes my whole map to be off set upon entering it. Until I found there is an offset option.
Guess I'm just blind.
